* Philosophy - wife (Our discussions about life, the universe, and everything always leave me feeling inspired and challenged!)
* Humanities - wife (I love how we can both appreciate art, literature, and history for their own sake, as well as their impact on society.)
* Arts - wife (Your creativity and talent in the arts is something I constantly admire and aspire to!)
* Literature - wife (Our book club dates are some of my favorite times with you - I love how we can both get lost in different worlds and perspectives!)
* English - wife (I'm so grateful for your help with my writing and your insightful feedback - you're an amazing editor and partner in crime!)
* Music - husband (I love how we can both appreciate different genres and styles, and how music can bring us together in so many ways!)
* History - uncle (Our discussions about the past always leave me with a newfound appreciation for the present and the future.)

So, which ones do you prefer? ðŸ˜Š
